Title: PIEDMONT REALTY TRUST ANNOUNCES PRICING OF CASH TENDER OFFER FOR ANY AND ALL OF ITS OUTSTANDING 9.250% SENIOR NOTES DUE 2028
Summary: Atlanta, Nov. 19, 2025 ( GLOBE NEWSWIRE ) -- Piedmont Realty Trust, Inc. ( "Piedmont" or the "Company" ) ( NYSE: PDM ) today announced the pricing of the cash tender offer to purchase any and all of its outstanding 9.250% senior notes due 2028 ( the "notes" ) for the consideration described ...
--------------------------------
Title: 21shares Solana ETF launches amid crash, but flows signal investor interest
Summary: The 21shares Solana exchange-traded fund ( TSOL ) debuted with over $100 million in assets under management, signaling investor interest.
--------------------------------
Title: Toll Brothers at Veranda Bay Community Opens in Flagler Beach, Florida - Toll Brothers  ( NYSE:TOL ) 
Summary: FLAGLER BEACH, Fla., Nov. 19, 2025 ( GLOBE NEWSWIRE ) -- Toll Brothers, Inc. ( NYSE:TOL ) , the nation's leading builder of luxury homes, today announced the grand opening of Toll Brothers at Veranda Bay, a new community of modern single-family homes in Flagler Beach, Florida.
--------------------------------
Title: Toll Brothers Opens Willows at Brookfield Luxury Townhome Community in Brookfield, Connecticut - Toll Brothers  ( NYSE:TOL ) 
Summary: BROOKFIELD, Conn., Nov. 19, 2025 ( GLOBE NEWSWIRE ) -- Toll Brothers, Inc. ( NYSE:TOL ) , the nation's leading builder of luxury homes, today announced the opening of Willows at Brookfield, a new luxury townhome community in Brookfield, Connecticut.
--------------------------------
Title: Kitron Acquires DeltaNordic, Strengthening Its Position in Defence
Summary: ( 2025-11-19 ) Kitron ASA, through its subsidiary Kitron Holding AB, has entered into an agreement to acquire DeltaNordic AB, a Swedish provider of advanced electronics and electrical systems with a strong foothold in the defence market.
--------------------------------
Title: These Analysts Revise Their Forecasts On Baidu After Q3 Earnings - Baidu  ( NASDAQ:BIDU ) 
Summary: Baidu, Inc. ( NASDAQ:BIDU ) reported a decline in revenue and negative free cash flow for the third quarter on Tuesday. The company reported quarterly revenue of $4.38 billion, a decline of 7% year-on-year ( Y/Y ) , topping analysts' consensus estimate of $4.31 billion.
--------------------------------
Title: Rapala VMC Corporation Issues EUR 25 Million Hybrid Bond
Summary: Rapala VMC Corporation, Stock Exchange Release, November 19, 2025 at 09:15 p.m. ...
--------------------------------
Title: Amer Sports Analysts Boost Their Forecasts After Upbeat Q3 Earnings - Amer Sports  ( NYSE:AS ) 
Summary: Amer Sports, Inc. ( NYSE:AS ) reported better-than-expected third-quarter financial results and raised its FY25 guidance above estimates on Tuesday. The company reported third-quarter adjusted earnings per share of 33 cents, beating the analyst consensus estimate of 25 cents.
--------------------------------
Title: Bell Media's Original Series HEATED RIVALRY Scores Major International Sales Ahead of Premiere, Including HBO Max in the U.S. and Australia
Summary: - Crave Original series acquired by HBO Max in the U.S. and Australia, Movistar Plus+ in Spain, and Sky in New Zealand - - Sphere Abacus drives global distribution wins for Bell Media's premium Canadian content -
--------------------------------
Title: Fed minutes show divide over October rate cut and cast doubt about December
Summary: While the Federal Open Market Committee approved a cut at the meeting, the path forward looks less creation.
--------------------------------
Title: Peter Schiff Warns 'The Race To Get Out Of Bitcoin Is On' As BTC Drops 4%
Summary: Bitcoin ( CRYPTO: BTC ) has slipped below the $89,000 mark, fueling widespread concern and raising the question: has the bull run ended, or is the market simply transitioning into a new phase?
--------------------------------
Title: What's Going On With GE Vernova Stock Wednesday? - GE Vernova  ( NYSE:GEV ) 
Summary: GE Vernova Inc ( NYSE:GEV ) shares are trending higher on Wednesday. The company announced the signing of its first onshore wind repower upgrade contract outside the U.S. GEV shares are climbing with conviction. Get the complete analysis here.
--------------------------------
Title: These Analysts Increase Their Forecasts On Medtronic After Strong Q2 Earnings - Medtronic  ( NYSE:MDT ) 
Summary: Medtronic Plc ( NYSE:MDT ) on Tuesday reported strong second-quarter 2026 results. The company's sales reached $8.96 billion, surpassing the consensus estimate of $8.87 billion. This marks a 6.6% increase year-over-year, with organic growth of 5.5%.
--------------------------------
Title: New Hampshire Unveils $100 Million Bitcoin Collateralized Municipal Bond
Summary: The bond requires overcollateralization by 160%, and will result in liquidation if the value of Bitcoin collateral falls below 130% of the bond's value.
--------------------------------
Title: 1 Prediction for Synopsys in 2026
Summary: The company appears poised for a strong recovery next year, driven by four key catalysts.
--------------------------------
Title: Why Is Plug Power Stock Sinking Wednesday? - Plug Power  ( NASDAQ:PLUG ) 
Summary: Plug Power, Inc. ( NASDAQ:PLUG ) shares fell Wednesday after the company announced a $375 million private offering of convertible senior notes. JP Morgan analyst Bill Peterson maintained a Neutral rating and withdrew the price forecast for the company.
--------------------------------
Title: Albemarle's Options: A Look at What the Big Money is Thinking - Albemarle  ( NYSE:ALB ) 
Summary: Investors with a lot of money to spend have taken a bullish stance on Albemarle ( NYSE:ALB ) . We noticed this today when the trades showed up on publicly available options history that we track here at Benzinga. Whether these are institutions or just wealthy individuals, we don't know.
--------------------------------
Title: This Is What Whales Are Betting On Core Scientific - Core Scientific  ( NASDAQ:CORZ ) 
Summary: High-rolling investors have positioned themselves bearish on Core Scientific ( NASDAQ:CORZ ) , and it's important for retail traders to take note. \This activity came to our attention today through Benzinga's tracking of publicly available options data.
--------------------------------
Title: Newmont Unusual Options Activity For November 19 - Newmont  ( NYSE:NEM ) 
Summary: Financial giants have made a conspicuous bullish move on Newmont. Our analysis of options history for Newmont ( NYSE:NEM ) revealed 25 unusual trades. Delving into the details, we found 60% of traders were bullish, while 32% showed bearish tendencies.
--------------------------------
Title: How Is The Market Feeling About Airbnb Inc? - Airbnb  ( NASDAQ:ABNB ) 
Summary: Airbnb Inc's ( NYSE:ABNB ) short interest as a percent of float has fallen 6.22% since its last report. According to exchange reported data, there are now 18.05 million shares sold short, which is 4.22% of all regular shares that are available for trading.
--------------------------------
